name: Crash Wheels
description: Arcade racing with the physics of damage
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core i3 2.8 GHz Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 540M DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core i5-4670 / AMD FX-8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD HD 7870 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
